modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "homepage",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "title": "Page Builder Home",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "pbPages",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "staticData": [],
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.pbadmNonAdmPages"
            },
            {
                  "name": "pageBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "adminPagesForm",
                              "type": "form",
                              "label": "Page Builder Administration",
                              "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                              "showInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "virtualDomainLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "label": "",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/virtualDomainComposer/loadVirtualDomain",
                                          "imageUrl": "",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Virtual Domain Composer",
                                          "documentation": "test",
                                          "labelStyle": "",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "visualPageComposerLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/visualPageModelComposer/loadComposerPage",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Visual Page Composer",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "cssStyleSheetManagerLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/cssManager/loadCssManagerPage",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "CSS Stylesheet Manager",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "pageRolesLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/customPage/page/pbadm.PageRoles",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Page Roles",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "virtualDomainRolesLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/customPage/page/pbadm.VirtualDomainRoles",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Virtual Domain Roles",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "exportPageLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/customPage/page/pbadm.ExportPages",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Export Pages",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "exportDomainsLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/customPage/page/pbadm.ExportVirtualDomains",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Export Domains",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "exportCssStylesheetsLink",
                                          "type": "link",
                                          "url": "/banner-sspb-test-app/customPage/page/pbadm.ExportCss",
                                          "replaceView": true,
                                          "description": "Export Css Stylesheets",
                                          "style": "list-link"
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "pageForm",
                              "type": "form",
                              "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                              "showInitially": true,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "pageList",
                                          "type": "list",
                                          "model": "pbPages",
                                          "allowReload": false,
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "required": false,
                                          "pageSize": 0,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "value": "CONSTANT_NAME",
                                          "onClick": "window.location.assign(rootWebApp + 'customPage/page/' + currentSelection.CONSTANT_NAME);",
                                          "onLoad": "$adminPagesForm.$visible = false;\nif (typeof($$user) !== 'undefined') {\n    if ($$user.authenticated) {\n        if ($$user.authorities && $$user.authorities.length > 0 &&\n            _.findWhere($$user.authorities, {assignedSelfServiceRole: \"WTAILORADMIN\"})) {\n            $adminPagesForm.$visible = true;\n        }\n   }\n}"
                                    }
                              ],
                              "label": "Runtime Pages"
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ],
      "importCSS": "pbadm.homePageCss"
}
